1184520.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Samhain Pack 4 (Token Pack)
1184520.description:
This product depicts 60 uniquely designed 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. it was a mash, it was a monster mash! Enjoy some Halloween treats in this pack
This pack includes the following.
Creatures:
  • Carnivorous Plants, both attacking and with victim in it's mouth
  • Burn Victim
  • Zombie Dogs
  • Ghost Brides
  • Green Hags
  • Spells of Hell
  • Classic Sheet Ghosts
  • Mad Scientists
  • Mad Scientists Monster
  • Night Hags
  • Scarecrow People
  • Spectres
  • Demon Dogs
  • Ancient Vampire Counts
  • Witches
  • Princesses of Hell
  • Werewolf in Human Form
  • Werewolves
Objects:
  • Broken Wooden Cart
  • Creepy Manor House
  • Creepy Trees
  • Gargoyle Statue
Map:
Included is a Manor grounds map to be used in your fantasy campaign.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
